name: Piscina EL CANDAMO
address: Km 23 1/2, Avenida Túpac Amaru, Carabayllo 15319, Peru

reviews.author: Jhordy Rafael Vasquez García
reviews.text: The pool is a real pain, the lifeguards are lazier than a sloth, and they're really annoying ☺️ and they break everyone's dick, and the pool is really boring ☺️

reviews.author: Rodil Gonzales
reviews.text: Muy rústico y caro para el servicio que dan, muy sucio la piscina.

reviews.author: e.roberto villegas nieto
reviews.text: Comfortable and cozy, there are places where you can eat typical dishes, next to a river... a relaxing place

reviews.author: Vanesa Lopez
reviews.text:
Spacious atmosphere, good pools
There were too many flies in one of the restaurants
You couldn't even eat

reviews.author: Hugo Cesar Macedo Huerta
reviews.text: A good place to spend time with family, pleasant atmosphere
